body.p: The AI Positron add-on is a very useful copilot when editing in Oxygen other document types like XSLT Stylesheets, Schematron documents, JSON content.

For example when an XSLT stylesheet is opened in Oxygen the Development menu category contains three useful actions:
Explain code - select for example an XSLT template and invoke this action to explain in simple to understand terms what the XSLT template does.
Document code - select for example an XSLT template and invoke this action to add documentation before the XSLT template explaining what it does.
New chat - start a discussion with the AI based on the contents of an opened XSLT stylesheet or Schematron document.
